AddDevice.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mna.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AddDevice
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DeviceName": "xxx",
    "Remark": "xxx",
    "DataKey": "xxx",
    "Encrypted": "false"
}
AddDevice.title: 新建设备

GetDevice.document: 获取设备基本信息和网络信息
GetDevice.title: 获取指定id设备信息

GetDevices.document: 获取设备基本信息列表
GetDevices.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mna.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: GetDevices
<公共请求参数>

{
    "PageSize": "10",
    "PageNumber": "1",
    "Keyword": "mna-xxx"
}
GetDevices.title: 获取设备基本信息列表

GetFlowStatistic.document: 获取指定id设备流量使用信息
GetFlowStatistic.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mna.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: GetFlowStatistic
<公共请求参数>

{
    "EndTime": 1659514692,
    "Type": 1,
    "DeviceId": "abc",
    "TimeGranularity": 1,
    "BeginTime": 1659513692
}
GetFlowStatistic.title: 获取指定id设备流量使用信息

GetMultiFlowStatistic.document: 批量获取指定设备列表流量使用信息
GetMultiFlowStatistic.title: 批量设备流量使用信息

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mna.tencentcloudapi.com

UpdateDevice.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mna.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateDevice
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DeviceId": "abc",
    "DeviceName": "abc",
    "Remark": "abc",
    "UpdateNetInfo": [
        {
            "Type": 0,
            "DataEnable": true,
            "UploadLimit": 1,
            "DownloadLimit": 1,
            "NetInfoName": "abc"
        }
    ]
}
UpdateDevice.title: 更新设备
